name: Hell Cards
description:
Cards enemies drop give you powers.

Controls:

Left mouse button - use card power

Right mouse button - shoot gun

Scrollwheel - change card

WASD - movement

Credits:

Most of everything was made by me.

Uses m6x11 font by Daniel Linssen: https://managore.itch.io/m6x11

Pixel Art Cards: https://platinum-7645.itch.io/pixel-art-cards

Pistol by Kenney (pixelated by me)

Gunshot sound from Freesound by RSilveira_88 (modified by me)
